name: Blue Mountain Bicycle Tour
description:
Featured in Vogue, Departure and Town & Country Magazine and seen on Discovery’s Television, Travel Channel. A must do tour while in Jamaica.
Travel in style to the lush tropical and scenic hills of the Blue Mountains and there you will find Blue Mountain Bicycle Tour, the #1 downhill bicycle tour. This tour includes round trip transportation, brunch and lunch, guided tour, bicycles and safety gears.
